ComicInfo.Title: The Wondermen, Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
The story of the Wondermen continues as Violet's connection to Wonderland is revealed. As Calie looks deeper into the Wondermen cult, she learns that their connection to Wonderland goes beyond a single mastermind; they've uncovered the locations of Wonderland's worst on Earth.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Gregbo Watson & Sanju Nivangune | 1 | B | Cover B | Noah Salonga & Leonardo Paciarotti | 3 | C | Cover C | Paolo Pantalena & Ula Mos | 4 | D | ComicsPRO Bombshell Exclusive Cover, Limited to 250 | Age Velez | Missing | E | ComicsPRO Bombshell Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Age Velez | Missing | F | Valentine's Day Exclusive Cover, Limited to 350 | Franchesco! | 2 | G | Valentine's Day VIP Exclusive Cover, Limited to 100 | Franchesco! | Missing |
